welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oggaz, Algeria! Prepare to be charmed by our vibrant city known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Oggaz has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Es Senia Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Es Senia Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tafaraoui Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Mascara-Ghriss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
